| Appearances = "[[The Night Lands]]"}} '''Amy Dawson''' is a British actress.Â 

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' she is playing the role of the [[Captain's daughter]] in the [[Season 2|second season]] episode "[[The Night Lands]]".<ref>[http://unitedagents.co.uk/amy-dawson United Agents Client Details for Amy Dawson]</ref> She joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
